metadata.title: CVE-2014-5340 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The wato component in Check_MK before 1.2.4p4 and 1.2.5 before 1.2.5i4 usesthe pickle Python module unsafely, which allows remote attackers to executearbitrary code via a crafted serialized object, related to an automationURL.

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
